entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h early this morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
